history.proof: intros sigma c t H. unfold at_head_of_queue. exists t. apply H.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
num_Clients: nat

Goal:
forall (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue (sigma Server) = c :: t -> at_head_of_queue sigma c

Premises:
queue = fun d : Data => let (queue, _) := d in queue : Data -> list Client_index
Inductive Name : Type := Client : Client_index -> Name | Server : Name
Client_index = fin num_Clients : Type
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
at_head_of_queue = fun (sigma : Name -> Data) (c : Client_index) => exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = c :: t : (Name -> Data) -> Client_index -> Prop Arguments at_head_of_queue _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record Data : Type := mkData { queue : list Client_index; held : bool } Arguments mkData _%list_scope _%bool_scope
locks_correct = fun sigma : name -> data => forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments locks_correct _%function_scope
ServerNetHandler_cases : forall (src : Name) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ServerNetHandler src m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> out = [] /\ ((exists c : Client_index, src = Client c /\ m = Lock /\ queue st' = queue st ++ [c] /\ (queue st = [] /\ ms = [(Client c, Locked)] \/ queue st <> [] /\ ms = [])) \/ m = Unlock /\ queue st' = List.tl (queue st) /\ (queue st' = [] /\ ms = [] \/ (exists (next : Client_index) (t : list Client_index), queue st' = next :: t /\ ms = [(Client next, Locked)])) \/ ms = [] /\ st' = st /\ m <> Unlock)
locks_correct_input_handlers : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (sigma : Name -> Data) (u : Label) (st' : Data) (out : list Output) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i (sigma h) = (u, out, st', ms) -> locks_correct sigma -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma h st')
locks_correct_update_false : forall (sigma : name -> data) (st' : Data) (x : Client_index), locks_correct sigma -> held st' = false -> locks_correct (update name_eq_dec sigma (Client x) st')
valid_unlock = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pSrc p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_unlock _%list_scope _%bool_scope
valid_locked = fun (q : list Client_index) (h : bool) (c : Client_index) (p : packet) => pDst p = Client c /\ (exists t : list Client_index, q = c :: t) /\ h = false : list Client_index -> bool -> Client_index -> packet -> Prop Arguments valid_locked _%list_scope _%bool_scope
Record Decomposition (B : BaseParams) (M : MultiParams B) : Type := Build_Decomposition { state_invariant : (name -> data) -> Prop; network_invariant : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant : packet -> packet -> Prop; network_network_invariant_sym : forall p1 p2 : packet, network_network_invariant p1 p2 -> network_network_invariant p2 p1; state_invariant_init : state_invariant init_handlers; state_invariant_maintained_input : forall (h : name) (inp : input) (sigma : name -> data) (st' : data) (out : list output) (ps : list (name * msg)), input_handlers h inp (sigma h) = (out, st', ps) -> state_invariant sigma ->...-> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant (map (fun m : name * msg => {| pSrc := pDst p; pDst := fst m; pBody := snd m |}) ps) } Arguments Build_Decomposition _ _ (_ _ _ _)%function_scope _ (_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _)%function_scope
ClientNetHandler_cases : forall (c : Client_index) (m : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), ClientNetHandler c m st = (u, out, st', ms) -> ms = [] /\ (st' = st /\ out = [] /\ m <> Locked \/ m = Locked /\ out = [Locked] /\ held st' = true)
update_nop_ext : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (h : A), update A_eq_dec sigma h (sigma h) = sigma
mutual_exclusion = fun sigma : name -> data => forall m n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client m)) = true -> held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> m = n : (name -> data) -> Prop Arguments mutual_exclusion _%function_scope
locks_correct_locked = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_locked _%function_scope
locks_correct_unlock = fun (sigma : name -> data) (p : packet) => pBody p = Unlock -> exists c : Client_index, valid_unlock (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p : (name -> data) -> packet -> Prop Arguments locks_correct_unlock _%function_scope
update_diff : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x : A) (v : B) (y : A), x <> y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = sigma y
update_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (sigma : A -> B) (x y : A) (v : B), x = y -> update A_eq_dec sigma x v y = v
nodup = NoDup_cons Server (fun H : In Server (map Client (all_fin num_Clients)) => let H0 : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B), In y (map f l) -> exists x : A, f x = y /\ In x l := fun (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A) (y : B) => match in_map_iff f l y with | conj x _ => x end in let H1 : exists x : Client_index, Client x = Server /\ In x (all_fin num_Clients) := H0 Client_index Name Client (all_fin num_Clients) Server H in match H1 with | @ex_intro _ _ x (conj H3 _) => let H5 : False := eq_ind (Client x) (fun e : Name => match e with | Client _ => True | Server => False end) I Server H3 in False_ind False H5 end) (NoDup_map_injective Client (fun (x y : Client_index) (_ : In x (all...
InputHandler_cases : forall (h : Name) (i : Msg) (st : Data) (u : Label) (out : list Output) (st' : Data) (ms : list (Name * Msg)), InputHandler h i st = (u, out, st', ms) -> (exists c : Client_index, h = Client c /\ (i = Lock /\ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = [(Server, Lock)] \/ i = Unlock /\ out = [] /\ held st' = false /\ (held st = true /\ ms = [(Server, Unlock)] \/ st' = st /\ ms = []))) \/ out = [] /\ st' = st /\ ms = []
init_data = fun _ : Name => {| queue := []; held := false |} : Name -> Data
NetHandler = fun (nm src : Name) (m : Msg) => match nm with | Client c => ClientNetHandler c m | Server => ServerNetHandler src m end : Name -> Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
Name_rect : forall P : Name -> Type, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_ind : forall P : Name -> Prop, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_rec : forall P : Name -> Set, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
Name_sind : forall P : Name -> SProp, (forall c : Client_index, P (Client c)) -> P Server -> forall n : Name, P n
ServerNetHandler = fun (src : Name) (m : Msg) => st <- get;; (let q := queue st in match m with | Lock => match src with | Client c => (when (null q) (send (src, Locked));; put {| queue := q ++ [c]; held := held st |});; ret (MsgLock c) | Server => ret Nop end | Unlock => match q with | _ :: x :: xs => put {| queue := x :: xs; held := held st |};; send (Client x, Locked) | _ => put {| queue := []; held := held st |} end;; ret MsgUnlock | Locked => ret Nop end) : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
ClientNetHandler = fun (i : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Locked => put {| queue := []; held := true |};; write_output Locked;; ret (MsgLocked i) | _ => ret Nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
InputHandler = fun (nm : Name) (m : Msg) => match nm with | Client c => ClientIOHandler c m | Server => ServerIOHandler m end : Name -> Msg -> Handler Data
step_s_ind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> Prop, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P d d0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- SingleParams ?P]
step_s_sind : forall P : data -> data -> list (input + output) -> SProp, (forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> P s s' tr) -> forall (d d0 : data) (l : list (input + output)), step_s d d0 l -> P d d0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- SingleParams ?P]
nw_nw_distinct_pairs_and_elim : forall (xs : list packet) (a b : packet) (ys l : list packet), l = xs ++ a :: ys -> In b (xs ++ ys) -> distinct_pairs_and network_network_invariant l -> network_network_invariant a b where ?B : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?M : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?B] ?d : [num_Clients : nat |- Decomposition ?B ?M]
SST_deliver : forall (i : input) (s s' : data) (out : list output) (tr : list (input + output)), input_handler i s = (out, s') -> tr = inl i :: map inr out -> step_s s s' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- SingleParams ?P]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepFailure_dup : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwState := nwState net |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P0] ?params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailureParams ?P]
StepOrderedDynamic_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) ->...-> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
ClientIOHandler = fun (i : Client_index) (m : Msg) => match m with | Lock => send (Server, Lock);; ret (InputLock i) | Unlock => data <- get;; when (held data) (put {| queue := []; held := false |};; send (Server, Unlock));; ret (InputUnlock i) | Locked => ret Nop end : Client_index -> Msg -> Handler Data
StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) to d |} ->...-> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedDynamic_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic net net' tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?new_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NewMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
StepFailureDiskOp_dup : forall (net net' : do_network) (failed : list do_name) (p : do_packet) (xs ys : list do_packet), nwdoPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net' = {| nwdoPackets := p :: xs ++ p :: ys; nwdoState := nwdoState net; nwdoDisk := nwdoDisk net |} -> step_failure_disk_ops (failed, net) (failed, net') [] where ?P0 : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- DiskOpMultiParams ?P0] ?disk_op_failure_params : [num_Clients : nat |- DiskOpFailureParams ?P]
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l where ?P : [num_Clients : nat |- BaseParams] ?multi_params : [num_Clients : nat |- MultiParams ?P] ?overlay_params : [num_Clients : nat |- NameOverlayParams ?multi_params] ?fail_msg_params : [num_Clients : nat |- FailMsgParams ?multi_params]

unfold at_head_of_queue.
exists t.
apply H.
